text: Such studies will allow an estimation of the PPV of the screening test to detect HSIL+, CIN2+ or $\mathsf { C l N 3 + }$ .The PPV to detect $\mathsf { H S I L + }$ or $\mathsf { C l N } 2 +$ is the number of histopathological high-grade lesions – includes histological HSIL as per LAST terminology (HSIL-CIN2 and HSIL-CIN3); high-grade CIN as per CIN terminology (CIN2 and CIN3); HSIL not specified; AIS – divided by the total number of women who tested positive and had satisfactory histopathology results and multiplied by 100.
ChatGPT_response_0: 要检测HSIL+或CIN2+的PPV，您可以将对筛查测试检测的高级病理病变数量（包括根据LAST术语的病理学HSIL（HSIL-CIN2和HSIL-CIN3）；根据CIN术语的高级CIN（CIN2和CIN3）；未指定的HSIL；和AIS）除以测试结果呈阳性且具有满意病理学结果的妇女总数，然后乘以100来计算。这个比例将给出您所寻找的关于检测HSIL+或CIN2+的PPV的估计值。
query: 这些研究将允许对筛查测试检测HSIL+、CIN2+或CIN3+的PPV进行估计。要检测HSIL+或CIN2+的PPV是多少？
ChatGPT_query_a:
You are HuatuoGPT-II, equipped with in-depth knowledge in medicine. Your task is to directly answer the user's <question> in Chinese. In formulating your response, you must thoughtfully reference the <reference text>, ensuring that your reply does not disclose your reliance on <reference text>. Please be cautious to avoid including any content that might raise ethical concerns.

<question>: 这些研究将允许对筛查测试检测HSIL+、CIN2+或CIN3+的PPV进行估计。要检测HSIL+或CIN2+的PPV是多少？

<reference text>: Such studies will allow an estimation of the PPV of the screening test to detect HSIL+, CIN2+ or $\mathsf { C l N 3 + }$ .The PPV to detect $\mathsf { H S I L + }$ or $\mathsf { C l N } 2 +$ is the number of histopathological high-grade lesions – includes histological HSIL as per LAST terminology (HSIL-CIN2 and HSIL-CIN3); high-grade CIN as per CIN terminology (CIN2 and CIN3); HSIL not specified; AIS – divided by the total number of women who tested positive and had satisfactory histopathology results and multiplied by 100.

<reply>:
response: 要检测HSIL+或CIN2+的PPV，您可以将对筛查测试检测的高级病理病变数量（包括根据LAST术语的病理学HSIL（HSIL-CIN2和HSIL-CIN3）；根据CIN术语的高级CIN（CIN2和CIN3）；未指定的HSIL；和AIS）除以测试结果呈阳性且具有满意病理学结果的妇女总数，然后乘以100来计算。这个比例将给出您所寻找的关于检测HSIL+或CIN2+的PPV的估计值。
